name: Faster (itch) (Asue, Oxalotte)
description:
Tip : the game run better on Firefox !

---

Hello everyone :)

Faster is a 2D game made for the Weekly Game Jam 100. The theme was "100".

Your objective is to complete a level in less than 100 seconds !

Don't hesitate to share your high scores ^_^

-----------------------------------------

Team

-> Asue : programming, design and sounds.

-> Oxalotte : specially composed all the musics for the game (OST here).

-----------------------------------------

Controls

Move the character : Left and Right Arrows / AD / QD

Jump : Up Arrow / W / Z / Space

Crouch : Down Arrow / S

Pause : Escape

Restart the level : R

-----------------------------------------

Free Assets

  • Character : Generate with pixeldudesmaker (0x72)
  • CRT Shader : Geri
